means: 屈膝，蹲伏( crouch的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He crouched as near to the door as he could.
A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentence.Network_cn: 一群秃鹫蹲伏在一具野牛的尸体上。

sentence.Network_en: He crouched behind a low hedgerow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他蹲在一排低矮的树篱后面。

PerfectNetExp.abs: He growled , crouched down and in one fierce jump attacked the plush vegetable ., 他低吼着 , 蹲下身来 , 接着猛地一跃 , 向这只长毛绒的胡萝卜发动了进攻.
the lioness crouched ready to strike ., 母狮低伏着身子准备攻击.
The cat crouched in the grass , poised to jump ., 猫儿蹲踞在草丛中 , 准备跳跃.
The lioness crouched ready to strike ., 母狮低伏著身子准备攻击.

entry.def: If you are crouching, your legs are bent under you so that you are close to the ground and leaning forward slightly.

example.ex: We were crouching in the bushes...

entry.def: If you crouch over something, you bend over it so that you are very near to it.

example.ex: Meantime, here I crouch over a cup of tea in my unheated study.
example.tran: 与此同时，在没有暖气的书房里，我只能就着一杯茶取暖。

sentences.sentence: "poorly clothed men huddled low against the wind"
"he stayed in the ditch hunkered down"

auth_sentence.content: He crouched over the fire trying to get warm.
auth_sentence.res_content: He crouched over the fire trying to get warm.

auth_sentence.content: Straining in every fibre I crouched there, panting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Straining in every fibre I crouched there, panting.

auth_sentence.content: I've been crouched over the notebook all afternoon.
